Title: Chloramphenicol
Writer: Joseph Weisberg (created by), Tracey Scott Wilson
Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker, Lev Gorn
Plot: A devastating flaw during a mission forces Philip, Elizabeth, William, and Gabriel to confront the depths of their patriotism... and their mortality. In Russia, in striving to be a better person, has Nina put her life on the line?
